main_package package¶

Submodules¶

main_package.Base module¶

main_package.Field module¶

class main_package.Field.Field(position_on_map, grass_status)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for a basic field on the map. Is used as a parent for other field variations. Has 2 parameters: position_on_map and grass_Status and only method stat

Parameters:

  • position_on_map (int)

  • grass_status (str)

stat()[source]¶

Method used to print out fields parameters, used while testing

class main_package.Field.Obstacle(position_on_map, grass_status, obs_type)[source]¶

Bases: Field

Class which is a special variation and a child class to Field. Represents an obstacle that could harm a horse object. Has one new parameter obs_type and one new method run_in_obstacle

Parameters:

  • position_on_map (int)

  • grass_status (str)

  • obs_type (chr)

run_in_obstacle(obj)[source]¶

Method executes consequences if horse objects finds itself on obstacle field

stat()[source]¶

Method used to print out parameters of Obstacle

class main_package.Field.PredatorField(position_on_map, grass_status, pred_speed, pred_strenght)[source]¶

Bases: Field

Child class of Field. Represents a field with predators that can harm a horse object. Checks predator and horses stats and according to them takes away health points from horse object.

Parameters:

  • position_on_map (int)

  • grass_status (str)

  • pred_speed (int)

  • pred_strenght (int)

attack(obj)[source]¶

Method comparing stats of horse and predator and executing the results

stat()[source]¶

Method that prints parameters of predator field

class main_package.Field.PredatorLair(position_on_map, grass_status)[source]¶

Bases: Field

Child class of Field. Represents a field with many predators whom instantly kill a horse_object that would step on it

Parameters:

  • position_on_map (int)

  • grass_status (str)

group_attack(obj)[source]¶

Method killing a horse

stat()[source]¶

Method that prints out parameters of predator lair

main_package.Herd module¶

class main_package.Herd.Herd(herd_size)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class responsible for creating a list of horse objects, and setting them a starting position on the map.

Parameters:

herd_size (int)

add_member(typ, num)[source]¶

Method responsible for adding a member to the herd. Creates a horse object and appends it to the herd list. Every horse object is randomly generated,except for their type which is chosen by the user

Parameters:

typ (chr)

delete_member(h)[source]¶

Method that deletes a horse from the herd, so it is no longer on the herd list

set_starting_position(numfields)[source]¶

Picks a starting position for a horse in herd. Only 2 horses can start from the same field

stats()[source]¶

main_package.Horse module¶

class main_package.Horse.Draught(gender, age, health, speed, strenght, horse_position, strenght_Modifier)[source]¶

Bases: Horse

Child class of Horse class, presents a specific type of horse - a draught. It inherits everything from Horse class and adds 1 new parameter: strenght.Modifier and 1 new method: move.Obstacle

Parameters:

  • gender (chr)

  • age (int)

  • health (int)

  • speed (int)

  • strenght (int)

  • horse_position (int)

  • strenght_Modifier (int)

move_obstacle(obs_type, field)[source]¶

Method allowing draught horse to delete an obstacle from a field it’s currently positioned on. Only certain types of obstacles can be removed

stats()[source]¶

Method printing parameters of draught horse

class main_package.Horse.Horse(gender, age, health, speed, strenght, horse_position)[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Abstract class presenting a structure for horse objects. Has 6 parameters: gender, age, health, speed, strenght and horse_postition. Has basic method like eat, move, death and breed that every horse object can do regardless of its specific type

Parameters:

  • gender (chr)

  • age (int)

  • health (int)

  • speed (int)

  • strenght (int)

  • horse_position (int)

breed(obj, herd)[source]¶

Method allowing herd to grow bigger, checks interracting horses gender and if they are of the opposite gender, adds a new member to the herd

death(herd)[source]¶

Method deleting a horse from the program. Occurs when health has dropped below or is equal to 0.

eat(grass)[source]¶

Method that can restore horse objects health, checks grass status on the field where the horse is currently and adds health points accordingly

move(row, column)[source]¶

Method allowing horses to move on the map. It takes into consideration where horse is currently on the map and calcualte possible movement options, then randomly chooses one of them and changes given

horses horse_position

class main_package.Horse.Normal(gender, age, health, speed, strenght, horse_position)[source]¶

Bases: Horse

Child class of Horse class, presents a specific type of horse - a normal horse. It inherits everything from Horse class adds 1 new method: run

Parameters:

  • gender (chr)

  • age (int)

  • health (int)

  • speed (int)

  • strenght (int)

  • horse_position (int)

run()[source]¶

Method allowing normal horse to move one more time during a day

stats()[source]¶

Method printing out parameters of normal horse

class main_package.Horse.Pony(gender, age, health, speed, strenght, horse_position, speed_Modifier)[source]¶

Bases: Horse

Child class of Horse class, presents a specific type of horse - a pony. It inherits everything from Horse class and adds 1 new parameter: speed.Modifier and 1 new method: sneak.Obstacle

Parameters:

  • gender (chr)

  • age (int)

  • health (int)

  • speed (int)

  • strenght (int)

  • horse_position (int)

  • speed_Modifier (int)

sneak_obstacle(obs_type, field)[source]¶

Method allowing pony object to not lose health points when on obstacle field. Only some obstacles can be avioded

stats()[source]¶

Method printing out basic parameters of pony
